project.name: jMonkeyEngine3
project.description: Builds, tests, and runs the jMonkeyEngine3 core engine.

target.name: build-bullet-natives
target.description: uses native build tools to build the bulletjme binary (read bullet-native-build.txt for more info)

target.name: run-bullet-native
target.description: runs the jMonkeyEngine3 demos using native bullet

target.name: build-openal-soft-natives
target.description: uses native build tools to build the openalsoftjme shared library for Android

target.name: -do-compile
target.description: Overrides default compile target to separate the build into folders

target.name: -pre-jar
target.description: Prepares the separate jME3-xxx.jar files and modifies properties for libraries to be used for lib/ folder, Manifest etc.

target.name: maven-repo
target.description: Creates a fucking maven repo from the jars
target.echo: Creating jME3 natives maven repo files

target.name: update-sdk
target.description: convenience target to transfer jme3 libraries to sdk (jMonkeyPlatform)

target.name: -javadoc-build
target.description: Overrides default javadoc target to exclude test javadoc

target.name: create-zip-distribution
target.description: puts jme3 jars, libs, source and javadoc in a dated zip file
